Parameter name in database encryption settings. Example: 'Encryption Algorithm: AES-256'
Parameter name in database encryption settings. Defines the number of times/iterations a calculation (transform) should be executed. Example: 'Transform Rounds: 100'

Parameter name in database encryption settings. Defines the number of computations to run in parallel/simultaneously. Example: 'Parallelism: 2 threads'

trans-unit.source:
Attachments of some entries are missing data. This is a sign of database corruption, most likely by the last used app (%1$@). KeePassium will preserve the empty attachments, but cannot restore them. You should restore your database from a backup copy.
Missing attachments: %2$@
trans-unit.target:
Bazı girdilerin eklerinde dosya eksiği var gibi görünüyor. Bu büyük olasılıkla son kullanılan uygulama tarafından (%1$@) veritabanınızın bozulduğunun bir işaretidir. KeePassium veritabanını bu haliyle korur, ama kayıp verileri geri alamaz. Eksik dosyalara ulaşmak için veritabanınızı önceki bir yedek kopyadan geri yüklemelisiniz.
Eksik dosya: %2$@
trans-unit.note: A warning about missing attachments after loading the database. [lastUsedAppName: String, attachmentNames: String]

trans-unit.source:
Some entries have attachments without a name. This is a sign of previous database corruption.
Please review attached files in the following entries (and their history): %@
trans-unit.target:
Bazı girdilerin içinde isimsiz ekler bulundu. Bu veritabanınızın daha önceden tahribata uğramış olduğunu gösterir.
Lütfen aşağıdaki girdilerin eklerine (ve geçmişlerine) göz atın: %@
trans-unit.note: A warning about nameless attachments, shown after loading the database. [listOfEntryNames: String]

trans-unit.source:
Some entries have custom field(s) with empty names. This can be a sign of data corruption. Please check these entries:
%@
trans-unit.target:
Bazı girdilerin içinde isimsiz alan(lar) tespit edildi. Bu verilerinizin tahribata uğramış olabileceği anlamına gelir. Lütfen bu girdileri kontrol edin:
%@
trans-unit.note: A warning about misformatted custom fields after loading the database. [entryPaths: String]

trans-unit.source: The database contains some attachments that are not used in any entry. Most likely, they have been forgotten by the last used app (%@). However, this can also be a sign of data corruption. Please make sure to have a backup of your database before changing anything.
trans-unit.target: Bu veritabanının içinde, hiçbir girdide gözükmeyen bazı ekler bulunuyor. Büyük ihtimalle daha önce kullanılan uygulama tarafından silinememişler (%@). Ama bu verilerinizin tahribata uğradığı anlamına da gelebilir. Lütfen herhangi bir değişiklik yapmadan önce veritabanınızın yedeğini alın.
trans-unit.note: A warning about unused attachments after loading the database. [lastUsedAppName: String]

trans-unit.target: '%@' isimli dosya, yakın zamanda silinenler arasında ve buradan da yakında silinebilir. Verinizi tutmak için çöp kutusundan başka bir yere taşıyın.

trans-unit.id: [File/PermissionDenied] Try to remove the file from the app, then add it again.
trans-unit.source: Try to remove the file from the app, then add it again.
trans-unit.target: Dosyayı uygulamadan silmeyi ve sonra geri eklemeyi deneyin.
trans-unit.note: A suggestion shown after specific file errors (either databases or key files).
Action: re-add (a broken) database or key file to the app.

trans-unit.source: This is a temporary backup database. It can be automatically deleted without a warning. Don't use it as your main database.
trans-unit.target: Bu geçici yedekleme veritabanıdır. Herhangi bir uyarı vermeden kendiliğinden silinebilir. Bunu ana veritabanınız olarak kullanmayın.
trans-unit.note: Notification when user opens an in-app backup database.

trans-unit.source: Storage provider is not available. Please check whether it is installed and logged in to your account.
trans-unit.target: Yer sağlayıcınıza ulaşılamıyor. Yer sağlayıcınızın programının yüklü olup olmadığını, yüklüyor programa giriş yapıp yapmadığınızı kontrol edin.
trans-unit.note: Error message: storage provider app was logged out or uninstalled.

trans-unit.source: %@ is not available. Please check whether it is installed and logged in to your account.
trans-unit.target: %@'a ulaşılamıyor. Lütfen programın yüklü olup olmadığını, yüklüyse giriş yapıp yapmadığınızı kontrol edin.
trans-unit.note: Error message: storage provider app was logged out or uninstalled [fileProviderName: String].

trans-unit.target: Ağ üzerinde veri sağlama hizmeti şu an bağlı değil.
trans-unit.note: Error message: the required network drive is not connected.

trans-unit.target: USB bellek şu an bağlı değil.
trans-unit.note: Error message: there is no USB drive connected to the device.

trans-unit.source: Access to this storage is disabled by your organization.
trans-unit.target: Access to this storage is disabled by your organization.
trans-unit.note: Error message: organization's IT administrator has forbidden access to a data storage location.

trans-unit.source: Network access is blocked by the settings.
trans-unit.target: Network access is blocked by the settings.
trans-unit.note: Error message: network access is forbidden by system or app settings.
Error message: storage provider app (e.g. Google Drive) does not respond to requests.
Error message: file provider does not respond to requests. For example: `Google Drive does not respond.`
Error message: file provider does not support write operations. For example: `Cannot save file (OneDrive)`

trans-unit.source: Microsoft has recently switched OneDrive integration with iOS to read-only mode. Temporarily, they say.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft yaptığı son değişiklikle OneDrive'ın iOS entegrasyonunu sadece salt okunur olarak değiştirdiğini duyurdu. Bu durumun geçici olacağını söylüyorlar.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of a file writing error

trans-unit.source: Use the Export option to save file to another location.
trans-unit.target: Dosyayı farklı bir konuma kaydetmek istiyorsanız "Dışa Aktar" seçeneğini kullanın.
trans-unit.note: Suggestion for error recovery

trans-unit.source: KeePassium needs your permission to access '%@'.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium needs your permission to access '%@'.
trans-unit.note: Error message for file with an expired access permission [fileName: String].

trans-unit.source: Select the file again to allow access
trans-unit.target: Select the file again to allow access
trans-unit.note: Action/button for error recovery
Error message: storage provider app (e.g. Google Drive) does not respond to requests (quickly enough).
Error message: file provider does not respond to requests (quickly enough). For example: `Google Drive does not respond`

trans-unit.source: Internal KeePassium error, please tell us about it.

trans-unit.source: Press and hold Cmd or Shift key to select multiple items.
trans-unit.target: Press and hold Cmd or Shift key to select multiple items.

Action/button to change the order of items in a list (move them higher/lower).
Action/button to select some items in a list.
Number of bits. For example: '123 bits of entropy'. IMPORTANT: Please fill out all the plural forms. (Key in .stringsdict)
Number of entries selected. For example: 'No entries selected', '1 entry selected'. IMPORTANT: Please fill out all the plural forms. (Key in .stringsdict)
Number of entries found in an incoming file. For example: 'Found entries: 42' [itemCount: Int]
Number of list items selected. For example: 'No items selected', '1 item selected'. IMPORTANT: Please fill out all the plural forms. (Key in .stringsdict)
Number of items in a list, search results, etc. For example: '0 items', '1 item'. IMPORTANT: Please fill out all the plural forms. (Key in .stringsdict)
Number of computation threads. For example: '4 threads'. IMPORTANT: Please fill out all the plural forms. (Key in .stringsdict)
Name of the Recently Deleted (Recycle Bin) directory, as shown in the Files app
Title of a notification when the user tries to close a document with unsaved changes
Title of a generic file export screen.
Action to save data, when we ignore minor problems in the process.
Action/button to save data to a different file
Title of an error message about file export
Message shown when trying to copy into an existing file.
Title of an error message about file import
Action/button to delete a file (destroys the file forever)
Action/button to remove a file from the app (the file remains, but the app forgets about it)
Action to proceed after a warning, basically 'I understand the risk'
Title of a list with predefined quick-choice values (for example: 'Presets: 1 week, 1 months, 1 year')
Action: refresh list of items, usually files
Title of a search field (a noun, not verb)
Title of a menu with various utilities
Action/button to open an online support article (about a specific error)
Title of a screen/list view configuration: sort order, visible items, etc
Warning message template. Swap the icon and message for right-to-left languages.
Title of an error message notification
Title of an error message about iOS system keychain
Title of an warning message
Action/button to cancel whatever is going on

Action/button to write an email to support
Action/button to proceed with the action
Action/button to move an item (to another group/folder/etc)
Action/button to create an item (entry, group, file — depending on context)
Action/button to delete an item (destroys the item/file)
Action/button to delete all relevant/selected items
Action/button to discard any unsaved changes
Action/button to close an error message.
Action/button to finish (editing) and keep changes
Action/button to edit an item
Action/button to export an item to another app
Action/button shown below error messages. Tapping the button will start the fixing/repairing workflow described in the error message.
Action/button to import an item to another app
Action/button to view more help/info about some topic
Checkbox/Button to show additional actions
Action/button to move an item (to another group/folder/etc)
Action/button: generic OK
Action/button to open URL in the appropriate app (usually, web browser)
Action/button to replace/overwrite an item
Action/button to print a document
Action/button to rename an item
Action/button to replace an item with another one
Action/button to restore a backup/archived item in its original place
Action: repeat the previous (failed) action
Action/button to open Finder (macOS file manager) and highlight a given file
Action/button to share an item with another app (AirDrop, send an email, etc)
Action/button to show additional information about an error or item
Action/button to show sensitive info as it is, in plain text (as opposed to asterisks)
Checkbox/Button to show a text field in its full size
Action/button to skip the current step and proceed with the next one
Action/button to create a new sub-group in the current group

Default name of a new group

Possible value of the `Password AutoFill` setting. For example: 'Password AutoFill: Disabled'
Title of a setting: whether the item (e.g. entry) should be used in AutoFill feature
Possible value of the `Password Audit` setting. For example: 'Password Audit: Allowed'
Possible value of the `Password Audit` setting. For example: 'Password Audit: Disabled'

Possible value of the `Search` setting. Example: 'Search: Allowed'
Possible value of the `Search` setting, when the item should be excluded from search results. Example: 'Search: Disabled'
Title of a setting: whether the item (e.g. entry) should be considered during search. Example: 'Search: Allowed'
Default value of an item property. For example: 'Password Audit: Inherit from parent group (Allowed)'. [inheritedValue: String]

What's included in a price plan: 1 year of support via email
What's included in a price plan
What's included in a free plan: support via forums (as opposed to email support)
What's included in a price plan: existing premium features only (as opposed to `current + future`)

Family Sharing programme. Translation must match Apple's: https://www.apple.com/family-sharing/

trans-unit.source: Premium features added in the future would require a new purchase at full price.

What's included in a price plan: upcoming premium features (as opposed to `current only`)
What's included in a price plan. Please leave `perpetual fallback license` in English.

What's included in a subscription plan. By subscribing for a certain period, the user receives a permanent license for a version of the app. More info: https://keepassium.com/articles/perpetual-fallback-license/
What's included in a price plan
Price of the free pricing plan
Name of the free pricing plan
Marks the default pricing plan

trans-unit.source:
Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase.
Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase.
trans-unit.target: Satın alma onaylandığında Apple Kimliğinden ödeme tahsil edilecektir. Geçerli abonelik dönemi bitmeden en az 24 saat önceden otomatik yenileme özelliği kapatılmazsa abonelik otomatik olarak yenilenir. Mevcut abonelik döneminin bitmesine 24 saat kala hesabından yenileme ücreti tahsil edilir. Satın almadan sonra App Store’da hesap ayarlarına giderek aboneliklerini yönetebilir ve iptal edebilirsin.
trans-unit.note: Subscription conditions
Trial conditions. For example `30 days free, then $1 per month`

trans-unit.id: [Premium/Upgrade/Deferred/text] Thank you! You can use KeePassium while purchase is awaiting approval.
trans-unit.source: Thank you! You can use KeePassium while purchase is awaiting approval.
trans-unit.target: Teşekkürler! Biz ödeme onayını beklerken, siz KeePassium'un Premium özellikleri keşfetmeye başlayabilirsiniz.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when in-app purchase is deferred until approval (parental or corporate).
Status message when downloading available in-app purchases
Status: in-app purchase started

trans-unit.id: [Premium/Upgrade/RestoreFailed/text] No previous purchase could be restored.
trans-unit.source: No previous purchase could be restored.
trans-unit.target: Tüm önceki ödemeler geri yüklendi. Fakat bu uygulamayı daha önce satın almamışsınız.
trans-unit.note: Text of an error message: there were no in-app purchases that can be restored
Title of an error message: there were no in-app purchases that can be restored

trans-unit.target: Tüm ödemeler geri yüklendi, uygulamanın tadını çıkarın!
trans-unit.note: Text of the message shown after in-app purchase was successfully restored
Title of the message shown after in-app purchase was successfully restored
Message shown after buying or subscribing.
Action/button to start choosing premium versions and possibly buying one

trans-unit.source: Please check if you need to cancel your old subscription.
trans-unit.target: Lütfen eski aboneliğinizi iptal etmeniz gerekiyor mu kontrol edin.
trans-unit.note: Message shown after buying a lifetime version.
Product price for monthly premium subscription. [localizedPrice: String]
Product price for annual premium subscription. [localizedPrice: String]
Product price for once-and-forever premium. [localizedPrice: String]
Equivalent monthly price for an annual subscription. For example: `$12/year ≈ $1 / month`

trans-unit.id: [Premium/Upgrade] Hmm, there are no upgrades available. This should not happen, please contact support.
trans-unit.source: Hmm, there are no upgrades available. This should not happen, please contact support.
trans-unit.target: Hmm, yükseltme hazır değil. Bu olmamalıydı, lütfen desteğe başvurun.
trans-unit.note: Error message: AppStore returned no available in-app purchase options
Name of the permanent/never-ending license.

trans-unit.source: Connect directly to enterprise storage accounts, such as OneDrive for Business.
trans-unit.target: Connect directly to enterprise storage accounts, such as OneDrive for Business.
trans-unit.note: Description/call to action for the `Business Cloud Storage` premium feature.
Title of a premium feature: access to company's cloud accounts like 'OneDrive for Business'

trans-unit.source: Create new entries in AutoFill with main fields pre-filled.
trans-unit.target: Create new entries in AutoFill with main fields pre-filled.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Faster Sign-Ups` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: easier registration of new accounts, directly in AutoFill dialog

trans-unit.source: Upgrade to Premium and enjoy KeePassium at its best.
trans-unit.target: Premium'a geçin ve KeePassium'un tüm avantajlarından yararlanın.
trans-unit.note: A generic description of a premium feature
A generic title of a premium feature

trans-unit.source: Strengthen your security with hardware keys (YubiKey) in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Premium versiyonda; güvenliğinizi donanım anahtarları (YubiKey) kullanarak artırın.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Hardware Keys` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability use hardware keys (e.g. YubiKey) for encryption (In Title Case)

trans-unit.source: Upgrade to premium and open linked databases in one step.
trans-unit.target: Upgrade to premium and open linked databases in one step.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Linked Databases` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability to open databases referenced in another database (In Title Case)

trans-unit.id: [PremiumFeature/MultiDB/description] Easily switch between databases in the premium version.
trans-unit.source: Easily switch between databases in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Premium versiyonda veritabanları arasında kolayca geçiş yapın.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Multiple Databases` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability to use multiple databases (In Title Case)

trans-unit.source: Find out if any of your passwords have been exposed in a known data breach.
trans-unit.target: Find out if any of your passwords have been exposed in a known data breach.
trans-unit.note: Description/call to action for the `Password Audit` premium feature.
Title of a premium feature: discover which passwords are known to be compromized

trans-unit.source: Fill out login forms with a single tap, without even opening KeePassium.
trans-unit.target: Fill out login forms with a single tap, without even opening KeePassium.
trans-unit.note: Description/call to action for the `Quick AutoFill` premium feature.
Title of a premium feature: show relevant AutoFill entries right under the input field

trans-unit.source: KeePassium does not collect any personal or analytical data nor share it with anyone.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium herhangi bir kişisel veya analitik veri toplamaz ve kimseyle paylaşmaz.
trans-unit.note: A brief summary of the privacy policy (for offline mode)

trans-unit.source: KeePassium does not collect any personal or analytical data. Some features may involve data exchange with external services (on your request and for the sole purpose of making these services available to you). Such an exchange is governed by the privacy policy of the respective service.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium does not collect any personal or analytical data. Some features may involve data exchange with external services (on your request and for the sole purpose of making these services available to you). Such an exchange is governed by the privacy policy of the respective service.
trans-unit.note: A brief summary of the privacy policy (for online mode)
Section: privacy policy

trans-unit.source: Not enough memory to continue. This can happen with larger databases or too ambitious database settings (Argon2 memory parameter).
trans-unit.target: Devam etmek için yeterli hafıza yok. Ya veritabanınız çok büyük ya da veritabanı ayarlarınız çok komplike (Argon2 bellek parametresi).
trans-unit.note: Error message when a long-running operation was cancelled due to the lack of free memory (RAM).
Explanation/notification when a long-running operation was cancelled by user
Name of a feature that shows relevant entries directly next to the login/password forms.
Network security setting
Network connection. For example `Connection: WebDAV` or `Connection: MyCloud`.
Title of a section: username, password, etc

trans-unit.source: KeePassium will communicate directly with your online storage. This ensures reliable file transfer.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium will communicate directly with your online storage. This ensures reliable file transfer.
trans-unit.note: Description of the `Direct connection` sync method.
Title of a list with online storage services like OneDrive, Dropbox, etc.
Action: change properties of a remote network connection
Error message: user credentials rejected by the server
Network address of a file
Complete WebDAV URL including path prefix
Name of a predefined Google Drive folder which contains user's own files
Name of a predefined GoogleDrive folder which contains files shared with this user
Name of a predefined OneDrive folder which contains user's own files
Name of a predefined OneDrive folder which contains files shared with this user
Network address of a WebDAV server
Action: authenticate to Dropbox account

trans-unit.source: Dropbox needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.target: Dropbox needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.note: Error description: the user should manually sign in to their Dropbox account
Action: authenticate to Google Drive account

trans-unit.source: Google Drive needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.target: Google Drive needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.note: Error description: the user should manually sign in to their Google Drive account

trans-unit.source: OneDrive needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.target: OneDrive needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.note: Error description: the user should manually sign in to their OneDrive account

trans-unit.source: Open sign-in page in private web browser mode
trans-unit.target: Open sign-in page in private web browser mode
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
No comment provided by engineer.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium will assign file synchronization to the app of your storage provider. Some apps work better than others.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium will assign file synchronization to the app of your storage provider. Some apps work better than others.
trans-unit.note: Description of the `Integration via Files app` sync method.
Link to a help page for an online storage service. The parameter is the service name in fixed neutral form. Example: 'Nextcloud Setup Guide' or 'Synology NAS Setup Guide'.
Action: connect to a network server
Title: connection to a network storage
Name of an input field for entering the password again

trans-unit.source: Automatically download website icon after editing an entry.
trans-unit.target: Automatically download website icon after editing an entry.
trans-unit.note: Description of the auto-download favicons feature
Settings option: automatically download website icons/favicons
Title of AutoFill settings screen
Settings section: protection of databases, their keys and data inside them
Title of a yes/no setting: whether to include backup copies in the file list
An option in Group Viewer settings. Will be shown as 'Entry Subtitle: None', meanining that no entry details will be shown in any lists.
Title of a settings section: which entry field to show along with entry title
Title of a settings section: sort order of groups and entries in a list
Title of a yes/no setting
Title of list view configuration screen

trans-unit.source: This feature is blocked by your organization.
trans-unit.target: This feature is blocked by your organization.
trans-unit.note: Notification when corporate user tries to use a feature forbidden by organization's IT department.

trans-unit.source: This setting is managed by your organization.
trans-unit.target: This setting is managed by your organization.
trans-unit.note: Notification when corporate user tries to change an app setting controlled by organization's IT department.
Setting: preserve (cache) calculated database keys
Title of a yes/no setting

trans-unit.source: Allow KeePassium to make network connections to external services?
trans-unit.target: Allow KeePassium to make network connections to external services?
trans-unit.note: Confirmation dialog message
Settings section: how/whether the app is allowed to use networks/Internet
Description of the `Stay Offline` mode.
Setting option: the app should work offline
Description of the `Allow Network Access` mode.
Setting option: the app is permitted to use online features
Action/button which resets some settings to their default state.
Call to action (explains why a setting is disabled)
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'When Shaken: Lock App'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'When Shaken: Lock All Databases'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'When Shaken: Do Nothing'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'When Shaken: Quit App'
Title of a settings value. For example: `Remember Master Keys: No`
Title of a settings value, when it is not customized and we default to app's global settings. For example: `Remember Master Keys: Use App Settings (No)`
Title of a settings value. For example: `Remember Master Keys: Yes`
Title of the app settings screen
List sorting option (for file names). Example: 'Sort by: Name'
List sorting option, when no sorting is selected. Example: 'Sort by: None'
List sorting option, when items are manually ordered by the user. Example: 'Sort order: Custom'
Subtitle for a storage service: the app will have access only to its own dedicated folder.
Name of a cloud storage service
Name of a cloud storage service
Name of a cloud storage service
Name of a cloud storage service. Must match Microsoft's translation, see https://partner.microsoft.com/solutions/onedrive-for-business
Title of a file storage service option (for example: Dropbox, OneDrive, Other Services)
Template text of a bug report email
Name of an entry field. Acronym `TOTP` should not be translated.

trans-unit.target: KeePassium'u daha iyi hale getirebilmemiz için bize yardım et!
trans-unit.note: Call to action in the Donations screen.
Call to action in the Donations screen.

trans-unit.target: KeePassium'un ücretsiz kalmasını sağlayabilmemiz için bize yardım et!
trans-unit.note: Call to action in the Donations screen. (free = gratis)
Text in the Donations screen.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium is a free open-source app. You trust it with your most sensitive information. There are no ads, no spying, no nonsense — we respect you.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium ücretsiz açık kaynaklı bir uygulamadır. En hassas bilgileriniz için güvenle kullanabilirsiniz. Reklam yok, sinsi sinsi gözetleme yok, saçmalık yok. - Size saygı duyuyoruz.
trans-unit.note: Text in the Donations screen.

trans-unit.source: Do you like KeePassium but don't need the premium features?
trans-unit.target: KeePassium'u seviyorsunuz ama ücretli özelliklere ihtiyacınız yok mu?
trans-unit.note: Text in the Donations screen.
Notification after a successful donation.
Title of the tip box/donation screen.
Call to action, title of the tip box/donation screen.
Human-readable file location. Example: 'File Location: Remote server'
Human-readable file location. The file is situated either online / in cloud storage, or on the same device, but in some other app. Example: 'File Location: Cloud storage / Another app'
Human-readable file location: the file is on device, inside the app sandbox. 'Backup' is a dedicated directory for database backup files. Example: 'File Location: Internal backup'

Human-readable file location: the file is on device, inside the app sandbox. 'Inbox' is a special directory for files that are being imported. Can be also 'Internal import'. Example: 'File Location: Internal inbox'
Human-readable file location: the file is on device, inside the app sandbox. Example: 'File Location: Local copy'

trans-unit.source: Please select path to a folder
trans-unit.target: Please select path to a folder
trans-unit.note: Error shown when user selects a file path instead of folder path in WebDAV.
Call for action: insert YubiKey 5Ci to the Lightning port
Call for action: touch the sides of YubiKey 5Ci to continue
